com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.AspectDefinition

  • Packages that use AspectDefinition 
    Package Description
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop
    Provides the classes necessary for aspect-oriented programming.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the AOP framework.

      Weaves the advice from the given aspects into the framework-managed components and generates bytecode for them.
